name: clustur-module
description: Welcome to the Node.js Bootcamp by Piyush Garg! This repository contains the source code and notes for the bootcamp, organized into sections corresponding to the videos in the [Master NodeJS playlist](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLinedj3B30sDby4Al-i13hQJGQoRQDfPo) on [Piyush Garg's YouTube channel](https://www.youtube.com/@piyushgargdev).
